base_description: Tall, white, rectangular cabinet with a modern style.
part_description: Two doors with handles, four internal shelves, vertically stacked.
internal_interaction_description: The doors open outward to provide access to the shelves. The shelves are evenly spaced, allowing for storage of various items. The handles are positioned vertically for easy grip and opening.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall and used for storing household items. It interacts with people as they open and close the doors to access stored items. Its vertical design saves floor space in a room.
